UUIDTimer
public final class SystemUUIDTimer
extends Object

Simple UUID timer based on System.currentTimeMillis.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

getCurrentTime

public long getCurrentTime()
Description copied from interface: UUIDTimer

getCurrentTime in interface UUIDTimer

getResolution

public long getResolution()
Description copied from interface: UUIDTimer
Returns the resolution of the current timer. This value is supposed to be constant for each timer, so it may be cached by clients.

Specified by:
getResolution in interface UUIDTimer
